description.value:
After ingesting gain 2 additional Degrees of Success on successful Fellowship and Intelligence Tests for 1d5 hours. Afterwards make +0 Toughness Test or suffer -20 to Perception Tests for 1d5 hours, if failing by 3+ DoF, suffer additional -20 to Willpower tests for 1d5 hours, or until ingesting another dose.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
